channel.title: PlayStation 2 on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in PlayStation 2 on PacoChan's Website

item.title: RECV Editor
item.description: Tool to extract and edit texts and other localizable data from Resident Evil: Code Veronica for PlayStation 2, GameCube and Dreamcast.

item.title: Tales of the Abyss (PlayStation 2)
item.description: Another translation of the series by the team at Tales Translations. A huge project that ended up 100% translated, including images and video subtitles.
